pages.text: Generates power by burning up burnable materials. Generates a small amount of power but can be upgraded with augments.
Uses lava's heat to generate power. Place lava source blocks around the sides of the generator and it will passively generate a small amount of energy.
Uses wind to generate a small amount of power. The higher the windmill, the more energy is produced.
While a little bit of an investment when starting out, this dynamo can produce a good amount of energy by using lava as it's fuel. It is recommended to have a pump to get a lot of lava.
